subject: Vam pro haptic bracket
description_text:
Hello, I was wondering if the u-shaped bracket for the Vam pros allowed the
motors to be mounted horizontally to the brake and gas pedals ( just like
on the clutch).

conversations.body_text: Hi A Max,    Yes, you can refer to the effect in this video.  https://www.instagram.com/p/DQ_WxBuDLVU/
